name: 123 Syzygy
flavor: All in a row.

name: 55A-allFATE
flavor: To each a purpose, and to all a fitting end.

name: Aegis of the Kell
flavor: For this judgment, there is no protection.

name: Aegis of the Kell II
flavor: For this judgment, there is no protection.

name: Aegis of the Reef
flavor: Protect the borders. Punish the unjust.

name: Anomie MSm
flavor: Is lawlessness the natural state of the universe?

name: Antapex MSc
flavor: Which reality, but for the one we enact upon ourselves and others?

name: Apple of Discord
flavor: "For the fairest."

name: Bad Juju
flavor: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." - Toland the Shattered

name: Bad Seed Down
flavor: A manufacturing defect cracked the frame and fused its systems – and somehow made it deadlier.

name: Baryon MSc
flavor: Microbays for tactical systems enhance an already potent precision pulse rifle.

name: Black SUROS SWB-42
flavor: A lightweight and snappy Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Catena MSc
flavor: A light, responsive weapon with attachment points for unorthodox systems modules.

name: Coiled Hiss
flavor: Watch your step.

name: Cold Current
flavor: "There's something dark out beyond the Reef. I can feel it in the void…"

name: Corona MSc
flavor: Light the path. And when all else fails... aim for the head.

name: CRACKERJACK.BETA
flavor: Not liable for damage or disability caused by prototype performance.

name: Dead Air 09F3
flavor: The recoil-cushioning cytogel, left to grow, has fused into a primitive neural network.

name: Echo 33
flavor: "Negative. We will hold until overrun. Echo 3-3, signing off."

name: Evergreen II.I
flavor: Hope springs eternal.

name: Fair and Square
flavor: A formidable burst-fire, precision rifle, custom-rigged for Crucible combat. Scrupulously devoted to fair play.

name: Final Duty
flavor: Created for Paladin Hallam Fen in honor of his efforts at the fortress on Cybele.

name: Grasp of Malok
flavor: "Dutiful Malok. Many offerings of Light did he make at the Shrines of Oryx." —Eris Morn

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Make precision shots with this weapon to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Harrowed Smite of Merain
flavor: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

name: Hawksaw
flavor: A northwesterly wind is blowing.

name: Herja-D
flavor: Devastate your foes with the deadly precision of the Häkke Herja-D.

name: Hopscotch Pilgrim
flavor: It's a long road. Enjoy it.

name: Hotspur-A
flavor: Piezopolymer paneling makes the Häkke Hotspur-A a balanced war machine.

name: Hydrus
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the water snake of the night sky.

name: KAU8 Constellation Scar
flavor: Constellations are an artifact of perspective.

name: Lump Distribution
flavor: This nimble rifle's on-board tactical systems keep a scrupulous tally of combat stats.

name: Lyudmila-D
flavor: The cold sharpshooter's precision of the Häkke Lyudmila-D is a marvel to behold.

name: Moriaen-D
flavor: You are a child of many cultures, a protector of all peoples.

name: New Heart LDD
flavor: Clear!

name: Nirwen's Mercy
flavor: A burst-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: No Time To Explain
flavor: A single word is etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: "Soon."

name: Occulate MSc
flavor: Where does the cloaking Darkness end?

name: Oversoul Edict
flavor: The light of the will of Crota shines down like a vast and inverse sun.

name: Painted Apollo MSc
flavor: A highly accurate Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted Neptune MSc
flavor: A high-velocity Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted SUROS BZL-45
flavor: A precision Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Payment VI
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Payment VI
flavor: Paladin Hallam Fen commissioned this weapon in memory of his mentor, Paladin Imogen Rife.

name: Praedyth's Timepiece
flavor: "He skipped like a stone on time's ocean. This is what's left." - Unknown

name: Primed Starfall MSc
flavor: A tactically flexible Nadir pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Psi Alba IV
flavor: This power has always existed. Only our understanding is new.

name: Psi Alto III
flavor: This weapon's power comes from the strength of its wielder's will.

name: Psi Lento III
flavor: The journey to enlightenment is slow, but rewarding.

name: Psi Tempus II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Psi Tempus variant is a flexible multirole design.

name: Psi Tempus III
flavor: Multirole weapon. Fire control system can double as an NLS drive regulator, if you don't mind a gun flying your ship.

name: Psi Umbra I
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Psi Umbra variant is a common example, accurized for long-range work.

name: Psi Umbra II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The Psi Umbra II is a retooled precision weapon for long-range kills.

name: Psi Umbra II-A
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Umbra II-A variant is a flexible multirole design.

name: Psi Volo II
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The flat-topped bullpup Psi Volo is a snappy, featherweight design.

name: Psi Volo III
flavor: The Psi Volo's ergonomics and mass have been rigorously optimized for fast response.

name: Pulsar MSe
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The MSe is a close-quarters design, cut down for easy handling.

name: Pulsar MSm
flavor: The compact MSm handles very nimbly. Some Ghosts claim the onboard electronics are slightly intoxicating.

name: Raskova-A
flavor: The terror of the night. The strike from the shadows.

name: Red Death
flavor: Vanguard policy urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.

name: Reflection Sum
flavor: How to count the infinities?

name: Reflection Sum (Adept)
flavor: How to count the infinities?

name: Silvered Continuum MSc
flavor: A tactically flexible Nadir pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Silvered Procyon MSc
flavor: A burst-fire Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Skorri's Revenge
flavor: A burst-fire weapon forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Smite of Merain
flavor: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

name: Spare Change.25
flavor: Keep it.

name: Strange Suspect
flavor: Certainly not one of the usual suspects.

name: Super Pox VLO
flavor: Found in a null-g hangar, drifting alongside fourteen limbless and decapitated Fallen corpses.

name: SUROS BNS-13
flavor: A reliable but lightweight weapon, the Suros BNS-13 also has a flexible layout.

name: SUROS JPS-20
flavor: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. The JPS-20 is a smooth extension of the shooter, perfect for long-range fire.

name: SUROS JPS-32
flavor: The JPS-32 provides precision burst fire. Integrated micromotors control the barrel's harmonic resonance.

name: SUROS JPS-55
flavor: Smooth in the hand and precise on fire, the JPS-55 will illustrate your point quite nicely.

name: SUROS MIN-15
flavor: Balanced. Moderate. High-impact. SUROS.

name: SUROS PDX-41
flavor: Ergonomic. Autonomic. Animatronic. SUROS.

name: SUROS PDX-45
flavor: Lightweight. Snappy. Reflexive. SUROS.

name: SUROS PRI-44
flavor: Lightweight. Powerful. Modular. SUROS.

name: SUROS TSP-10
flavor: Suros prototype. Use against Vex targets to gather field data for the Suros research department.

name: Temporal MSm
flavor: Can the past ever be undone? Can the future ever be attained?

name: The Conduit
flavor: A burst-fire weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Messenger
flavor: From deep within the shadows it came—a messenger borne on black wings.

name: The Messenger (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: The Ninth Edict
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: The Stranger's Rifle
flavor: Ghost's analysis suggests this weapon has been exposed to incredible forces…and that parts of it shouldn't yet exist.

name: The Villainy
flavor: A burst-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Three Little Words
flavor: It's not enough to say them. You've got to MEAN them.

name: Time On Target
flavor: Three rounds rapid.

name: TKO (First Round)
flavor: Down and out.

name: Trifecta S.2
flavor: An accurized Vanguard-issue pulse rifle, stripped and rebuilt with tight tolerances for long-range accuracy.

name: Outbreak Prime
flavor: "I've done the math. When you pull this trigger, one plus one equals zero. Every time." —Shiro-4

name: Blind Perdition
flavor: "It is only a prison if you believe it to be." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Hopscotch Pilgrim
flavor: It's a long road. Enjoy it.

name: STEEL MEDULLA~
flavor: ~replicate~ devastate your foes ~consume~ Herja ~repeat

name: The Clever Dragon
flavor: Forged in honor of Timur, he whose spells cut deeper than any sword.

name: B-29 Party Favor
flavor: Let's get this party started.

name: Parthian Shot
flavor: Who's got the last laugh now?

name: The Waltz
flavor: A burst-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the Future War Cult's leaders.

name: Oversoul Edict (Adept)
flavor: The shadow of the will of Crota burns like the deepest winter, hopeless and without end.

name: Praedyth's Timepiece (Adept)
flavor: It measures the minutes of a lifetime and cuts short what is too long.

name: Smite of Merain (Adept)
flavor: Barrel etching: "He parted them like a sea, which closed upon him again."

name: ((STEEL MEDULLA~))
flavor: ~enhance(devastate) consume(foes) repeat insert(bansheeInterrupt(override))~
